text: avantan unkalai ippumiyil pintonralkalaka akkinan; enave evan nirakarittu vitukirano annirakarippu(taiya ketu) avanukkeyakum; kahpirkalukku avarkalutaiya nirakarippu avarkalutaiya iraivanitattil kopattaiyanri (veru etanaiyum) atikappatuttuvatillai anriyum kahpirkalukku avarkalutaiya nirakarippu nastattaiyanri (veru etanaiyum) atikappatuttuvatillai
